title: Validation and Utilization of Online Learning Module Motivation Measurement Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners must possess intermediate-level expertise in language education and be familiar with mobile learning using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can understand the structure of the MSLQ-Short Form-Revised and RIMMS tools and explain the motivational factors measured by each item.
Learners can analyze reliability and validity of survey data collected from online modules using SPSS/R.
Learners can recognize the need to correct negatively worded items when interpreting survey results and evaluate model fit using the revised tool (RIMMS).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
